attributes.action: Release the $9.5 billion of Afghanistans assets which have been frozen by USA
attributes.additional_details: Peoples wages are not being paid as the taliban simply do not have the resources to pay. this has led to extreme poverty all around the country and parents are even selling their children so the rest of the family can afford to live. By the freezing of the $9.5 billion, USA are causing the deaths of thousands of starving afghans.
attributes.background: USA has frozen $9.5 billion of afghanistans assets for the past 2 months which has led to extreme poverty and starvation in afghanistan. Taliban do not have enough funding to help the people and urgently need the money.

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about freezing assets held in the United States are a matter for the US government, not the UK Government or Parliament.

As a result it is not possible for the Government or Parliament to take the action you have requested.
